title: Video of Drunk Woman in Raj’s Manda Passed off as Child-Lifting
subtitle: A video is viral on YouTube with the claim that a woman who had allegedly kidnapped children was caught in Manda village in Rajasthan’s Pali district. The video shows a group of people gathered around the woman.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
Amid the increasing number of child-lifting rumours, a video is viral on YouTube with the claim that a woman who had allegedly kidnapped children was caught in Manda village in Rajasthan’s Pali district. The video shows a group of people gathered around the woman, and taking her to a different location to talk to her.

Viewed over 1,90,000 times, the caption of the video reads: “मांडा में छोटे बच्चों को किडनेप करनै वाली रंगे हाथ पकड़ी गई (Translated: The woman who kidnapped children was caught in Manda)."
